rules_text:
Whenever a player discards a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Karatuy.
When a player has no cards in hand, Karatuy becomes a Demon and gains flying and lifelink. This ability triggers only once.
Demoncycling {1}{B}{B} [i]({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Demon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
